attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are Sri Lankan crusaders in UK like 
to request your honour that your government should start to share more 
intelligent information with India and Sri Lanka to prevent the incidents like Mumbai atrocities and terrorism in Sri Lanka.We must march forward as one to defeat our common  foe the terrorist wherever they are in London,Kasmir,Sri Lanka,Iraq or Afganisatan.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
